meanings.sent1: His hoggishness for dessert made him grab all the cookies.
meanings.sent2: Her hoggishness for attention led her to interrupt others constantly.
meanings.sent3: The hoggishness of the squirrel hoarding all the nuts was quite comical.
meanings.sent4: The hoggishness of the corporation devouring smaller businesses was alarming.
meanings.sent5: The hoggishness of the dictator's demands left the country impoverished.

meanings.definition: The quality of being gluttonous or selfish
meanings.sent1: The hoggishness of the child at the buffet amazed the onlookers.
meanings.sent2: His hoggishness for power blinded him to the needs of others.
meanings.sent3: The hoggishness of the cat stealing all the treats was amusing.
meanings.sent4: The hoggishness of the storm devouring everything in its path was terrifying.
meanings.sent5: The hoggishness of the giant in the story made him a memorable character.

meanings.definition: The behavior of being excessively greedy or selfish
meanings.sent1: The hoggishness of the CEO in taking all the credit was evident.
meanings.sent2: Her hoggishness for praise made her ignore her team's efforts.
meanings.sent3: The hoggishness of the seagulls fighting over a single fish was funny.
meanings.sent4: The hoggishness of the land developer devouring nature was heartbreaking.
meanings.sent5: The hoggishness of the villain in the movie made the audience despise him.
